thread.title: Paramount has its own YouTube channel, shows free movies
thread.title_full: Paramount has its own YouTube channel, shows free movies | www.kirotv.com

author: Cox Media Group National Content Desk
title: Paramount has its own YouTube channel, shows free movies
text:
Tired of Netflix removing all of the good movies every month, without lowering the price you pay?
There's a totally legit YouTube channel that could come to your movie-blahs rescue.
>> Read more trending stories
Paramount actually put the channel up last December, but it is just coming to light, BGR News reported.
The Paramount Vault includes movies like Mel Gibson's "Hamlet," "King Creole" starring Elvis and "Masters of the Universe" with Dolph Lundgren.
The movies are in their entirety and totally free.
The site also has some of our favorite clips from classics like " The Ten Commandments " and " Ferris Bueller's Day Off ."
